channel.title: Sweet Potato on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Spicy sweet potato and black bean salad
item.description: The key here is "season to taste". We had more than 2 tsp of freshly made chipotle powder and I used it all, and it ended up being a bit more spicy than the normal food around our house (but still delicious). The recipe also calls for roasted pasilla peppers, which we didn't have so we didn't use them. I'm sure that any other roasted pepper would add to the flavor.
